meaningMnemonic: Remember 寝坊 and how it means <kanji>oversleep</kanji>? Someone who oversleeps in the <kanji>morning</kanji> is someone who's a <vocabulary>late riser</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the vocab words 朝 and 寝坊 put together into one. So long as you know them separately you should know them together too!
